ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine Quest Details....
ygData.msgSnippet: Just for those of us on the list who dont know the details on the first two coins, mind filling us in? Thanks!
ygData.messageBody:
Just for those of us on the list who dont know the details on the
first two coins, mind filling us in?

Thanks!
--------------------------------------------------------------
> Hmmm... went by Allakhazam's and they have no info on the quest... how
> odd.
>
> First thing's first, you must get a Star of Odus (buy it) from the jewelry
> shop in Erudin. Turn it in to the *MALE* banker in FV. He will then give
> you a 6-slot container with a combine button for the coins.
> Since you already have the ones from Dalnir's and Kaesora, we'll skip
> those.
> City of Mist- One drops from the Captian of the Watch (or something like
> that, I lost my detailed list :o/ )
> Emerald Jungle- Must be Foraged for. Grab a nearby druid and exchange a
> lil
> mana for the foraging ;o)
> Lake of Ill Omen- The Bloodgill gobbies in the lake (look at the base of
> the
> pillars around the center of the lake) carry these, and are probably the
> toughest creatures you'll have to fight in this quest.
> The Overthere- Check out the big pit in the center of the zone and kill a
> scorpoid (can't remember the exact name, but it's the rarer of the two
> kinds
> of scorpions in the pit).
> -all of these coins are fairly common drops-
> Put them in the box the banker gave you, hit combine (now it looks like a
> treasure chest), give it to him, and Voila! you have a Nostrolo's
> Tamborine
> (and you will notice the difference IMMEDIATELY).
>
> NOTE: Make *SURE* you have an empty spot in you general inventory for
> when
> he gives you the box for the gem (not sure about the tamborine, but always
> a
> good idea). If your inventory slots are full, you will get the "dropped
> to
> the ground message" but the box will be gone (ie: time to head back to
> Erudin again).
>
>
> Enjoy!
>
>
